summary: A neural network module that leverages the UniSpeech architecture to perform sequence classification on speech inputs, providing a forward computation pipeline and utilities to selectively lock parts of the underlying model for transfer learning.
business_intent: Enable developers to quickly deploy and fine‑tune speech‑based classification solutions—such as command recognition, sentiment analysis, or speaker intent detection—by reusing a pre‑trained UniSpeech model while optionally freezing its base, encoder, or extractor layers to reduce training cost and improve stability.
